xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/273425-Cara Mengundang Hantu 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qZDFgu78YUtdsLUVoaRuF7hwArZ.jpg In "Cara Mengundang Hantu" a chilling tale is composed out of four short stories that explain how to invite a ghost. The first story is about a banana tree that was chopped in half by Rizal. He will be haunted by a ghost because of his gambling and money lending issues. The second story is between a mom and son where the son disobeyed his mom and has to face the consequences. The third story is about a group of students that go against ancient beliefs and the fourth story is about revenge where a spirit hunts down its murderer. Cara Mengundang Hantu
